column2: "...Is that all you've got?"
"H-how dare you...little girl!!"
"W-what is this!? I'm...getting weaker!!"
"Guh...Nghh...! My...body! My...strength...!!"
"What...did you...do to me...you little brat!?"
"Why are you asking your enemy? Like hell I'd ever tell you."
"Now to devour you."
"Oh, you made it. Wait there, I'll be done here soon."
"Soon...? Did you say...soon?"
"I...the 【Apprentice】, am not to be taken lightly! Foolish ARKS!"
"...Clarissa."
"Damn, she got away. I was so close."
"...oh well. At least I sealed half of her power. She's a goner next time."
"...say, do you find me frightening?"
"1. Not at all"
"2. Honestly, yes."
"...Really? Do you mean that?"
"...I see. Yeah, I guess that's to be expected."
"There was a time when another ARKS saw me in combat."
"I was there to help, but I'll never forget that face."
"...I can never forget it. That look as if I wasn't human."
"Sigh...I knew then that I was different from everyone else."
"That person fled without saying a word. I didn't have a chance to express myself. Neither my anger, nor my sadness."
"Ever since, I was determined to work alone, unseen by others."
"I don't want to be hated by those I've sworn to protect."
"...and yet, I somehow met you."
"You've seen it all. I'm awe-inspiring, powerful, ...and very frightening."
"My body absorbs and erases Darkers and Falz alike. It's my purpose."
"Knowing this...it's best we don't meet again."
"I'll be fine. I'm used to my role."
"I fight to protect everyone's smiles. Alone...to the end."
"1. Why go that far?"
"2. Who do you mean by everyone?"
"Why? ...because I'm alive. Isn't that reason enough?"
"Exactly as it sounds. I slaughter the Darkers to protect everyone else. It's the reason I exist."
"I apologize for the bizarre question. No wonder I failed to finish her off."
"...Farewell."
